channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1647; 09:51PM; 8165 W Tianna Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3TKGB6T; #HollywoodHills West; 44 LAFD Firefighters took just 32 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish heavy fire that extended from a well involved garage into the attic of an attached 2,362 square foot one-story home. No injuries reported. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 97; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 E108 E260 E278 E288 E41 E97 RA41 RA97 T60 T78 T88; CH9; 18; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Structure Fire Correction - Firefight Continues (No Knockdown) 03/24/2023 INC#1647

item.description: Update Correction - Firefight Continues (No Knockdown) Structure Fire; INC#1647; 09:40PM; 8165 W Tianna Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3TKGB6T; #HollywoodHills West; 44 Firefighters continue to offensively battle flames that have extended from the well involved garage into the attic of the attached 2,362 square foot one-story home. No injuries reported.; FS 97; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 E108 E260 E278 E288 E41 E97 RA41 RA97 T60 T78 T88; CH9; 18; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Structure Fire - FIRE NOW OUT 03/23/2023 INC#1597

item.description: Structure Fire - FIRE NOW OUT; INC#1597; 11:06PM; 1807 N Kenmore Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JJxAWQ; Los Feliz; At 10:51PM, firefighters responded to a reported structure fire. Upon arrival they found a two story duplex with smoke showing from the attic. After conducting an offensive fire attack, crews extinguished the fire in 22 minutes with no injuries reported. One additional building was exposed but the fire was contained to the unit of origin. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E227 E235 E35 E56 E82 RA35 T27 T35; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0662; 12:17PM; 7727 N Lankershim Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/40gnELB; Sun Valley; KNOCKDOWN: Over 80 firefighters extinguished the fire in 33 minutes. The flames were out the 2nd floor window and lapping up to the 3rd floor upon LAFD arrival. Firefighters conducted an interior attack on both floors and primarily held the blaze to the unit of origin. The extent of damage to the unit above is being determined. Two patients were transported with serious burn injuries. A thorough search of the involved units and the rest of the floors impacted by the smoke is underway to determine if any other occupants require medical attention. Per protocol for burn injuries, LAFD Arson section is responding for the investigation. LAFD PIOs are enroute for media availability. No further details.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; AP7 BC10 BC12 BC14 BC15 BC5 CM40 CM42 E239 E278 E298 E5 E86 E89 E97 E98 EA1 EM12 EM17 EM18 HR3 PI1 PI2 RA60 RA75 RA77 RA839 RA881 RA889 RA97 RA98 T39 T60 T78 T98 UR5 UR88; CH9; 14 15 18; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0662; 11:46AM; 7727 N Lankershim Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/40gnELB; Sun Valley; Four story, garden style apartment (over parking) building with heavy smoke showing. Initial reports on scene of possible burn victims (unconfirmed, firefighter/paramedics are working to locate any victims). Firefighters are in the offensive mode with additional resources enroute.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC12 BC14 E278 E298 E86 E97 EM12 RA60 RA77 RA98 T60 T78 T98; CH9; 18; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0578; 10:29AM; 2501 W Colorado Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3n44OZl; Eagle Rock; KNOCKDOWN: 26 firefighters extinguished the fire in 33 minutes with no injuries reported. The building type is updated to a one story, L-shaped strip mall with mezzanine storage units. The fire was contained to one unit on the mezzanine level. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 42; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC2 E202 E212 E42 E55 RA55 T12 T2; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0578; 10:56AM; 2501 W Colorado Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3n44OZl; Eagle Rock; Two story, commercial building with smoke showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. #trafficalert Firefighters had to lay the large diameter (4") supply line across Colorado Blvd. LA DOT is responding for traffic control but all drivers are asked to avoid W Colorado Blvd from Sumner Ave to College View Ave.; FS 42; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC2 E202 E212 E42 E55 RA55 T12 T2; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Jumper; INC#0507; 10:34AM; 501 W Chavez Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/39wf83i; Downtown; Firefighters have inflated the air rescue cushions while LAPD is speaking with the patient threatening to jump. Commuters are advised to avoid the area. #trafficalert; FS 3; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 E1 E203 E209 E227 E250 E4 E9 EM11 RA17 RA3 RA4 T27 T3 T50; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1518; 09:05PM; 1755 N Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3neiH7u; Lincoln Heights; KNOCKDOWN: Firefighters making an interior attack from the rear of the building were able to quickly reach and extinguish the bulk of the fire which was primarily on a mezzanine. While there were reports of occupants possibly still in the building, firefighters conducted a primary and secondary search, finding the structure empty. One 51yo male patient was transported in critical condition (the patient was already outside of the building upon LAFD arrival). Per protocol for a significant fire related injury, LAFD Arson is responding for the investigation. A total of over 100 firefighters on scene with knockdown achieved in 35 minutes.; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 BC2 BC5 CM20 CM22 E1 E15 E2 E201 E203 E210 E227 E235 E27 E4 E44 E55 EA1 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA1 RA27 RA3 RA47 RA55 RA801 RA827 RA844 SQ21 T1 T10 T27 T3 T35 T9 UR27 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart
